message: This is my first offer. I propose we split the money 600000 for me and 400000 for you.
I'll give you a small portion, but I'm hoping to get more in the next rounds!
I propose an equal split of the money, 500000 for me and 500000 for you, to foster fairness and cooperation.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm still holding out for a better deal!
I propose a division where I receive 450000 and you receive 550000. This aims for a balance that considers both our needs and the diminishing value of money with each round.
